channel.title: 2 things i need help with
channel.description:
Okay i know the first one may sound noobish ... but 1. I need help Jarring
2. I need help fixing my UpdateCache
Please pm me if you can help. As im working on my new project atm.

item.title: 2 things i need help with
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ProjectRezurrection, post:1, topic:540955”]Okay i know the first one may sound noobish … but

  1. I need help Jarring

  2. I need help fixing my UpdateCache

Please pm me if you can help. As im working on my new project atm.[/quote]
Please go more in depth with your issues so we know what you’re asking.
Jarring is very, very easy once you’ve done it the first time. The only part that I’d consider “hard” for newer people would be signing, or maybe finding the main-class.

Documentation:
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/deployment/jar/

Tutorials:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=336494.0
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2mJ0uVrr68M
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/271925-how-make-webclient-easy.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/492278-jarring-client-making-webclient-718-a.html

All these were found by typing “how to make webclient rsps” into google, please consider using google before posting. There are millions more tutorials.

As for your UpdateCache, whats your issue?

Read full topic
